body:
You delete these objects at minimum every pass through training and every pass through the validation set. If you load images via HTTP, you may have stuck requests that don't timeout for minutes.

Deadlocks on exit can be worse than leaked processes -- you end up with failed training runs simply because some file handle stuck.
